LanguageData.COF_Torture_InsertionHeel.label: high heel
LanguageData.COF_Torture_InsertionHeel.descriptionAct: Insert a metal impalement directly into the flesh and blood, and it looks like a high-heeled shoe.
LanguageData.COF_Torture_InsertionHeel.comps.0.perman: The wound has healed and the flesh and blood are clinging to it.
LanguageData.COF_Torture_InsertionHeel.stages.0.label: wound

LanguageData.COF_Torture_InsertionNeedle.comps.0.perm: The wound has healed and the flesh and blood are clinging to it.

LanguageData.COF_Torture_BrandingIron.label: brand
LanguageData.COF_Torture_BrandingIron.comps.0.permane: The wound has healed, and it looks as if it can't be removed.
LanguageData.COF_Torture_BrandingIron.stages.0.label: wound
